name: Magical Cats in Various Lighting Conditions
name_original: Magical Cats in Various Lighting Conditions
description:
Magical Cats in Various Lighting Conditions gives us a cute little town, a place called
Summer’s End, full of cats, humans, and spirits.

The game focuses on the stories the cats of this town tell.

You’ll play a cat with magical powers in a semi-magical world, such as those of Miyazaki films, or like the world of Chuubo’s Magical Wish Granting Engine.

This game draws inspiration from Happy Rebel Tapestries’ Bell Songs, from John
Harper’s Blades in the Dark, and from Jenna Moran’s Chuubo’s Magical Wish Granting Engine.

There is no GM, and players work collaboratively to complete their Destinies together, eventually returning home to share a meal with one another.

The game is played with a set of PnP cards (included), some playbooks, and some d6s.

This game is free, but please consider leaving a tip if this game makes you feel cozy and you'd like to support me in creating games like these!
